data.name: Marty Thinks 4D Soundtrack
data.detailed_description:
Listen to music from Marty Thinks 4D any time you want with the soundtrack!
Songs are in an MP3 format and can be found in the folder titled "MT4D Soundtrack".

Track List:
A feather and a rock in a vacuum tube - 5:04
As the ground falls away beneath me I look to the stars - 5:18
Forget all that you know and all that you've been - 7:08
Gone but not forgotten, lost but not found - 3:27
I am Entangled in Quantum Fog - 1:42
I am floating through the sine waves - 4:30
I am Waltzing in the Graveyard Where My Master Lies - 2:57
I awaken to a dripping faucet beneath a window to the cosmos - 6:26
I stare in awe as the lights fill the sky - 5:32
I'm lost a maze of ruins but I have a nice hat - 2:38
Marty Boss Fight - no intro - 4:05
Marty Boss Fight intro - 0:13
My arm cannon is armed and I am ready - 6:27
My Circuits are Flowing to Intense City - 2:30
Never Give Up, Never Surrender - 4:18
Of steel and iron and all things permanent - 5:44
Reunited - 3:43
Space and time and all things beside - 3:40
The Doctor will know we have been here - 2:27
The filmstrip is smacking against the casing - 2:59
The filmstrip is smacking against the casing remix - 3:16
The Universe is So Large and I am So Small - 3:00
With Resolution, I Speed Towards My Destiny and Accept My Fate - 3:32
